Everybody Loves Raymond: The Complete Series Various (Actor, Director) Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Comedy ['Standup comedian Ray Romano stars as Ray Barone, a successful sportswriter who deals with his brother and parents, who happen to live across the street. Patricia Heaton ("The Goodbye Girl"), Peter Boyle ("While You Were Sleeping"), Doris Roberts ("Remington Steele"), and Brad Garrett ("Gleason") round out the stellar cast.'] {'Genre': 'Comedy/Television, Television', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Various', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), Spanish (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround)', 'Number Of Discs': '44', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 6.7 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'D207218D', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC', 'Run time': '77 hours', 'Release date': 'May 31, 2011', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'HBO', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '44'} Everybody loves Raymond, this is true, that's why I Bought it, we always loved the series, now we

Cheers: The Complete Series Ted Danson (Actor), Kirstie Alley (Actor), Multiple (Director) & 0 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Boxed Sets ["Wander in...pull up a stool...and make yourself at home where everybody knows your name with Cheers: The Complete Series, featuring all 270 episodes from 11 seasons, plus a host of exciting featurettes on 45 discs with vivid picture and sound quality. Ted Danson stars as Sam Malone, former relief-pitcher for the Boston Red Sox turned sober saloon owner of a popular neighborhood spot. Add a colorful cast of co-stars (Shelley Long, Kirstie Alley, Rhea Perlman, George Wendt, John Ratzenberger, Nicholas Colasanto, Woody Harrelson, and Kelsey Grammer) and you're all set to raise a glass to the legendary, 28-time Emmy ® Award -winning series GQ Magazine calls pretty much perfect."] {'Genre': 'Comedy/Television', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Contributor': 'Multiple, Ted Danson, Woody Harrelson, Kelsey Grammer, Shelley Long, John Ratzenberger, Kirstie Alley, George Wendt, Rhea PerlmanMultiple, Ted Danson, Woody Harrelson, Kelsey Grammer, Shelley Long, John Ratzenberger, Kirstie Alley, George Wendt, Rhea Perlman See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '45', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.66 Pounds', 'Item model number': '32429219183', 'Director': 'Multiple', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Run time': '110 hours and 26 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 5, 2015', 'Actors': 'Ted Danson, Kirstie Alley, Woody Harrelson, Shelley Long, Rhea Perlman', 'Studio': 'Paramount', 'Number of discs': '45'} Always loved this series, now I can watch whenever I want to. profile:

This user continues to showcase an enduring love for classic comedic series, characterized by nostalgia and exceptional storytelling. Although they recently encountered frustration with a purchase that didn’t meet expectations, their overall profile remains consistent with a preference for quality entertainment that explores family dynamics and relatable humor. With an impressive average rating of 4.9, they have a discerning taste and prioritize productions that excel in storytelling and humor.

Key preferences and trends:

- Exhibits a critical eye for production quality, supported by high ratings for series that successfully blend mature themes with comedic elements.
- The recent negative review indicates a willingness to express disappointment in their experiences when faced with technical issues, highlighting a commitment to quality.
- Their enjoyment of shared viewing experiences continues to be pivotal, reinforcing their desire for content that promotes family ties.

Overall, the user is an engaged viewer seeking a blend of humor and depth in their entertainment choices. Despite a recent setback, they remain committed to discovering films and shows that resonate emotionally and uphold high storytelling standards, further defining their profile as a discerning consumer of classic and quality entertainment.
